html:
Invitation for Bids

Government of Nepal (GoN)

Department of Hydrology and Meteorology

Invitation for Electronic Bids for the Supply and Delivery of AWS Spare Parts

IFB No.: DHM/G/NCB/04-2078/79

Contract Identification No: DHM/G/NCB/04-2078/79

Date of publication: 2078.08.24 (2021.12.10)

  1. The Department of Hydrology and Meteorology invites electronic bids from eligible bidders for the procurement of the Supply and Delivery of AWS Spare Parts under National Competitive bidding procedures specified in Public Procurement Act and Regulations.
  2. Eligible Bidders may obtain further information and inspect the bidding documents at the office of Department of Hydrology and Meteorology, Babrmahal, Kathmandu, P.B.no-406, 01- 4215131dhmprocurement@gmail.com or may visit e-GP system: www.bolpatra.gov.np/egp.
  3. Bidding documents is available online and can be downloaded from e-GP system: www.bolpatra.gov.np/egp. Interested bidders shall register in the e-GP system and deposit the

cost of bidding document (NRs. 3000.00 in the following bank. Name of the Bank Rastriya Banijya Bank Ltd.

Name of the Office: Department of Hydrology and Meteorology Office Code No.: 308023501

Office Account No. 1000100200010000 Revenue Head No.: 14229

  1. Pre-bidmeeting shall be held at Department of Hydrology and Meteorology, Babrmahal, Kathmandu at 13:30 pm, 2078.09.09.
  2. Interested Bidders shall submit the electronic Bids through on or before 12:00 pm 2078.09.25.
  3. Bids shall be opened in presence of Bidders' representatives who choose to attend on 12:35 pm at the office of Department of Hydrology and Meteorology, Babrmahal, Kathmandu. Bids must be valid for a period of 90 days counting from the day of bid opening and must be accompanied by bid security, amounting to a minimum of amount NRS.2,47,000.00, which shall be valid for minimum 30 days beyond the bid validity period.
  4. If the last date of submission and opening falls on a government holiday then the next working day shall be considered the last day. In such a case the bid validity and bid security validity shall be recognized with effect from the original bid submission deadline.
